participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, often reflecting on his past experiences.
participant_1.background: i am a 45 year old male. i am a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: enthusiastic and friendly, always eager to share stories and connect with others.
participant_2.background: for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.
